author: craigmcc
msg: According to Costin's response this fix is good, so I will go ahead and
commit it to the main branch.  Could someone who is using AJP13 test and
make sure it doesn't break something?
Submitted by: Jay Freeman <saurik@saurik.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: Surround the %CP% argument with double quotes everywhere it is used, so that
classpaths containing directories with spaces are still handled correctly.
Note that this patch, by itself, does not deal with the "command line too
long" problem.
Submitted by: Larry Isaacs <Larry.Isaacs@sas.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove "init" attribute from the <project> element so that the tests will
run with recent versions of Ant.
Submitted by: Juan Jose Pablos <jjp3@bton.ac.uk>

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the definition of "whitespace" being utilized in scanning to include
carriage return and newline characters.  Among other things, this corrects the
problem where request.getProtocol() was returning "HTTP/1.0\r\n" instead of
Submitted by: Based on a patch submitted by Robin Meade
<rmeade@outreach.hawaii.edu>

author: craigmcc
msg: Tweak the build scripts and build.xml for the sample application so that
it will run "out of the box".
